title: client: ensure delegate_dispatch! forwards event_created_child to delegates
Spell check and doc fixes
server: impl PartialEq for Client
server: global dispatch docs + delegate traits
client.native: Don't deref potential nullptr
backend (rs): dispatch event before marking objects destroyed
body: This makes the rs logic consistent with the sys backend.

title: Correct build.rs src/sys/*/log_shim.c rerun-if-changed path
dispatch docs for client and server, server delegate traits
Fix crates.io badges
(rework-317) wayland.xml: update to 1.20.0
client: remove unneeded Default bound for DelegateDispatch::UserData
body: DataInit has made this bound redundant.

title: std::fmt::Debug
body: Better now than later to do it all.

title: protocols: use gitlab fdo link for wayland-protocols
body: The free desktop gitlab is probably the preferred link nowadays.

title: client: docs for delegating proxy handling
body:
This changes the macro to obtain to the delegate using a closure. This allows the user to choose between referencing a field or function to get the delegate.

And documents the associated traits

title: backend, server: document types in rs and sys backends
body:
Documents a good portion of the rs and sys types in backends. Some parts I don't understand well enough yet to document.

This is a starting point for the wayland-backend docs, I imagine we will introduce some more docs regarding usage in the near future.

title: backend: ensure client and server types implement same traits
Add KDE server decoration protocol
Adding unstable Input method v2 protocol
body: The current input method, v1, is very hard to develop for. V2 is much better :smile:

title: Remove reference to non-existent function
body: The reference function was deleted in b523022401bed89d3d7123d18a17c106e412a6fe

title: Full rework of the library structure
body:
Addressing #317, and will probably fix a bunch of other issues.
